Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan will take on India in the Super 8 Group 1 match of the T20 World Cup 2024 at the Kensington Oval in Bridgetown, Barbados.
India will be coming into this match after topping the Group A standings in the league stage with three wins and one no result.
Afghanistan dented the hopes of New Zealand and finished at second place, after West Indies in Group C standings to seal the Super 8 spot.
The pitch at the Kensington Oval in the T20 World Cup 2024 has provided assistance to the fast bowlers and spinners alike.
The average first innings score of 154 at this venue in T20Is could prove to be quite a competitive total.
Afghanistan have drubbed the likes of Uganda, New Zealand, and Papua New Guinea in their first three wins at the T20 World Cup 2024.
In their last match, co-hosts West Indies overpowered Afghanistan's spin attack, handing them a 104-run defeat in St Lucia.
The top performers for Afghanistan thus far in the tournament are Rahmanullah Gurbaz, Ibrahim Zadran, Gulbadin Naib, Fazalhaq Farooqi, Naveen-ul-Haq, and captain Rashid Khan.
The top performers for India in the tournament are Rohit Sharma, Rishabh Pant, Suryakumar Yadav, Hardik Pandya, Arshdeep Singh, and Jasprit Bumrah.
Virat Kohli, who has been one of the top scorers in T20 World Cups over the years, is yet to go out all guns blazing.
